item.value: In addition, the processing of callback results for WeChat Pay and Alipay is also included.
This includes selecting a member type page, selecting a payment method page, generating a WeChat Pay QR code page, and querying a payment result page.
It is mainly used to implement the membership payment system.
This table is associated with the ``User`` table and records a payment record for a certain user.
To accomplish these functions, we designed the ``MembershipOrder`` table.
Each order has its status, and each unpaid order is valid for 60 minutes, so we created a task using Celery to delete an unpaid order that was longer than 60 minutes.
Handle links that track user access history.
Honestly, the logic here is not clear. Some functions that should not be put here are put here. Perhaps the overall architecture should be rethought.

As the name suggests, this is an application dedicated to miscellaneous.
